title.narrative: En 2021, le systeme educatif haitien et ses acteurs ont acquis des capacites techniques pour reduire les vulnerabilites etl'impact des situations d'urgence sur les enfants des niveaux prescolaire et primaire et sont en mesure de reagir en cas de crise.

description.narrative: UNICEF has always played an important role in supporting emergencies in Haiti. UNICEF contributes to more than 50% of the sector’s response in emergencies. UNICEF also supported the MoE in many activities such as coordinating all partners at the central and local levels, developing the Post Disaster Needs Assessment (PDNA), developing the response plan, and supporting the MoE in conducting rapid assessments with tools and through financial support. ; | Status:Constrained | As-of Date:17/01/2022
